title: 714 - Ice Cream Barons | Stan Chronicles 11
description:
Can Stan and Scoots put the cloud back in place or is it time to accept a world without clouds?

(You can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new website http://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com story starts at about 17:00)


Subscribe to “Adventures in New America”
- Adventures in New America, a brand new fiction podcast from Night Vale Presents, is the first sci-fi, political satire, Afrofuturistic buddy comedy, serialized for New Americans in a new and desperate time.

  • Set a few years in the future, Adventures in New America follows two mismatched African-New-American best friends as they take on a series of increasingly wild heists to get quick cash to pay for medical treatment.

  • The New York Times calls it "sympatico with Boots Riley’s ‘Sorry to Bother You’ in its critique of entwined capitalist and racist structures, and [says] the way it makes the horrific funny recalls the new era of social thriller being ushered in by Jordan Peele."

  • Tune in for radical reflections on our dangerous, beautiful and heart-pounded world.-Find out more at http://www.adventuresinnewamerica.com, or search for the show in your favorite podcast app.


Tonight’s show is sponsored by Quip! The sensitive sonic toothbrush I have been using for over two years (not over and over! Changing out the brush heads every three months!) Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://www.getquip.com/sleep, you get your first refill pack for FREE with a quip electric toothbrush.
